description.raw:
The gazebo6 branch doesn't compile ([jenkins](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-gazebo_6.0-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/15/))

This was caused by a nearly simultaneous merge of pull request #1773 and pull request #1792, with the failure in AltimeterSensor.cc:

~~~
gazebo/sensors/AltimeterSensor.cc:109:62: error: no member named 'Ign' in 'ignition::math::Pose3<double>' 
    this->dataPtr->altMsg.set_vertical_reference((this->pose.Ign() +                                                                        
                                                  ~~~~~~~~~~ ^                                                                              
gazebo/sensors/AltimeterSensor.cc:139:49: error: no member named 'Ign' in 'ignition::math::Pose3<double>' 
    ignition::math::Pose3d altPose = this->pose.Ign() + parentPose;                                                                         
                                     ~~~~~~~~~~ ^                                                                                           
gazebo/sensors/AltimeterSensor.cc:142:63: error: no member named 'pos' in 'ignition::math::Pose3<double>'; did you mean 'Pos'? 
      this->dataPtr->parentLink->GetWorldLinearVel(this->pose.pos).Ign();                                                                   
                                                              ^~~                                                                           
                                                              Pos                                                                           
gazebo/sensors/AltimeterSensor.cc:142:63: error: reference to non-static member function must be called; did you mean to call it with no arguments? 
      this->dataPtr->parentLink->GetWorldLinearVel(this->pose.pos).Ign();                                                                   
                                                   ~~~~~~~~~~~^~~                                                                           
                                                                 ()                                                                         
/usr/local/include/ignition/math/Pose3.hh:345:40: note: possible target for call                                                            
      public: inline const Vector3<T> &Pos() const                                                                                          
                                       ^                                                                                                    
/usr/local/include/ignition/math/Pose3.hh:352:34: note: possible target for call                                                            
      public: inline Vector3<T> &Pos()                                                                                                      
                                 ^                                                                                                          
4 errors generated.                                                                                                                         
make[2]: *** [gazebo/sensors/CMakeFiles/gazebo_sensors.dir/AltimeterSensor.cc.o] Error 1                                                    
make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....  
~~~

title: Fix build
